files.description: Narendra competed in a Christmas cooking contest held in Carrick-on-Shannon, displaying his culinary talents during the festive season.
Narendra participated in a Christmas cooking competition, showcasing his culinary skills against other contestants during the festive season.
Narendra received an award for his exceptional performance in an all-day dining restaurant at The Oberoi in New Delhi.
Narendra spearheaded the introduction of a new carvery lunch service at the Landmark Hotel, leading the initiative from its inception.
During his tenure, Narendra contributed to winning the award for the best waterside venue as the top wedding destination.
Narendra established the team and restaurant for La Madeleine, a French fine dining establishment, in Chennai, India.
Narendra's writeup on Ayurvedic cuisine was featured in Vogue Magazine's January 2016 issue.
Narendra was featured in Hospitality Biz in August 2015, sharing his culinary journey and insights with young chefs.
Narendra was featured in Breathe Magazine in August 2018 for his expertise in menu creation focused on weight loss and detox.
Narendra was awarded for serving the best bar food in Co. Leitrim.
